pull.title: build: Drop ZeroMQ patch for glibc < 2.12
pull.body:
This is a non-controversial commit that split out from #18405.

It is safe to use `pthread_setname_np` since #17538 when the minimal `glibc` version is set to 2.17; see: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11986#issuecomment-366105050.

events.body:
The initial #18405 has Concept ACKs from @promag, @practicalswift, @theStack, and @laanwj. 

cc @fanquake, @dongcarl
I don't think this needs to be split out. I'm reviewing #18405 now, and will likely merge it later today.
